eyl2k,

I'm using JUnit 3.8.1, and I have a few TestCases with many more than six
testXXX() methods.  Can you offer any more information about your
environment?

Craig

> -----Original Message-----
> From: eyl2k [mailto:eyl2k@...] 
> Sent: Friday, November 01, 2002 4:56 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] JUnit 3.8.1: Maximum number of testXXX() methods
> 
> 
> MyTestCase with 5 testXXX() methods runs as expected. When I 
> added a sixth testXXX() method, I get the following error message:
>     [java] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
> sun/reflect/ConstructorAccessorImpl
> 
> When I comment out one of the original testXXX() methods, 
> everything runs as expected, so the 6th testXXX() method I 
> added is fine.
> 
> I checked the FAQ but couldn't find this issue discussed.
> 
> Thanks for any information.
